Commonly, or if you are using the templates, these are the folders that can be set as the `source` field:

| Framework            | Source                             |
| -------------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| Next.js              | `out`                              |
| React, Astro, or Vue | `dist`                             |
| SvelteKit            | `build`                            |
| Angular              | `dist/<your-project-name>/browser` |
